评论概述: Not the same color at all
评论详情: It wasn’t the same color as the picture. Which is really disappointing because I loved the dark green color. Instead it was just a bright green color that I thought was very ugly
Cute, simple crop top. Good, tight fit
Buy the larger size if you don’t want to reveal more of your middrift. I love the retro feel of the white piping!
Para usarlo en zona donde vivo con temperatura de más de 24 grados centígrados súper cómoda, me gustó muchísimo

This tank top is very soft and comfortable. I like the design on the front of it. It is not a racerback tank top and I'm okay with that. I do like the wider straps. If it's me good. It comes to just above my hips. I know the pictures show it as being a crop top but, it is not. What I do like about it most is that even though it's white, it is not a see-through material.

评论概述: It’s very nice! Definitely buying more colors
评论详情: It’s great! A little see through with a white bra underneath but fits nicely around the torso. Fabric is nice too. I bought the white one to test it out to which i am looking forward to buying multiple colors of this purchase now. Definitely worth it!

I was on the lookout for a cute lounge tank top and stumbled upon this! It's made of a nice spandexy material that's pleasantly stretchy. It fits my body nicely, providing both comfort and style. I highly recommend it, especially if you're in need of a comfy and fashionable addition to your wardrobe!

Im happy with this! It’s as I expected and I like how it looks on me. It did well in the wash and is comfortable. It fits as it was shown in the product photos and I believe is pretty size accurate. I like the designs and will definitely check out more from Emmiol!

Crop tank shirts are surely complimentary to parachute pants. This shirt goes very well with my green ones that are a slightly deeper shade of the same green, how fortunate!  I would lie this top if it was a little longer, like how it looks on the model. I even ordered a medium, which was not even reaching my navel.  It is a very light knit. I had hoped it would be a bit more substantial. It is still a very nice little top.
This still feels too small for me
Not the material I expected but it’s a cute top and you can wear it with a strapless bra. I usually wear a size large and my body measurements are bust 39 in and waist 32 in, hope this helps you!

评论概述: Low quality and almost two sizes below North American sizing
评论详情: Wow, this one was very disappointing. Star stitching puckers all around it, looks warped even when it isn't worn. Sizing is tiny — the crop is VERY short. I ordered a size up from my usual medium and it was still like a small. Fabric is that plasticky ribbed feel and it just looks so sloppy and poor quality. Yuck.

The material is very soft and drapes well. The black star is actually embroidered! And it's gorgeous! Ordered a medium and it fits like a medium, shipped quickly and there was no smell with the packaging.
Got returned

评论概述: So soft and love the design!
评论详情: It's so cute and trendy! I love the material and the star in the middle. I know all the teenage girls will love this and I highly recommend it!
Muy buen material y queda muy bonito porque se amolda al cuerpo.

评论概述: Tight fit, should have sized up
评论详情: The design is cute and matches what was shown in the image, but I had issues with sizing.  The top was smaller than expected and very fitted. On the plus side, the material is decently stretchy and not too thin.

So first off, I'm usually a size small, I got this and expected a size small tank top (no crop, but fitted), but it is cropped and looks smaller than pictured in the photos. Material is weird Shein material they use for halter tops that feels rubbery and cheap. Oh, and also came in a bag with a tag from Emmiol 🙄 . It's still kinda cute, but I personally would not wear this more than once after the event I bought it for, even though I planned to. If the material was different, I would. However, it's just not the best quality and definitely wasn't worth the money. at best it should be like $7.
Super stretchy and comfortable material. True to size, I’m 5’3 115-120 lbs and got a small. Highly recommend this, it’s super cute.

评论概述: Cute.  Layering is a good idea
评论详情: Nice little tank.  Ribbed and looks nice.  Cool design too.It is make to be snug/tight.  With white, especially, I recommend layering it for sure!

评论概述: Cute, but a little tight, fabric a little thin
评论详情: Cute with some oversized pants. Size was a little tight. Fabric is a little thin, which is why I am deducting a star. You might have to wear another tank top underneath to help with the opacity of the fabric, but the top can still work. It's really cute and washes well in the washing machine. I recommend it but it runs small which affects the fabric quality as well.
The shirt is nice and very soft. I got it in the wrong size, so it was an error on my part. Cute design as well.
The shirt looks exactly like the picture. Is it a bit over price I believe so.

I adore this tank! I love wearing tank tops so I have gotten pretty picky about what kind of tank I like, and this meets all of my standards. The color blocking is such a great addition to the top, and the fabric is soft and thick. The length of the top is perfect, and the fit is flattering. I have no complaints.
It is definitely a crop top! Very tiny crop top! If you like tiny crop tops, this is the one for you! What little there is of this top is pretty.
absolutely love this, perfect length with a tight fit. it is ribbed material except for the star, which is super cute. great little top!

评论概述: Cute colors not a good fit
评论详情: Have to constantly pull down okay material and cute colors overpriced
